job.command:
foreach file (`cat $FILELIST | awk '{printf($1"\n")}'`) echo copying $file to $SCRATCH cp $file $SCRATCH end
echo making new file list ls $SCRATCH/*.picoDst.root > newFileList.list set FILELIST=newFileList.list cat $FILELIST
set mypath=/gpfs/mnt/gpfs01/star/pwg/dstewart/scratch/Yale-Physics/picoQA/2_EventTrees set mylist=/gpfs/mnt/gpfs01/star/pwg/dstewart/scratch/Yale-Physics/picoQA/list set bdtow=$mylist/BadTowers_Comb.08.02.list set bdrun=$mylist/P17_bad_runs.list root4star -l -q -b jetTrees.C\(-1,\"$FILELIST\",\"$mypath/root/P17/$JOBID\",\"$bdtow\",\"$bdrun\",0\)
